projectContext.description: Taconem is a tri-layer cognitive architecture for AI agents: Tasks, Concepts, Embeddings. This file supplies global context for the Cursor AI agent.
rules: Preserve the 3-layer ontology: Tasks (ephemeral), Concepts (persistent), Embeddings (long-term).
Follow bead model: beads stored as markdown under beads/* and loaded via MANIFEST.yaml.
Keep subsystems modular: core ≠ cli ≠ daemon.
Avoid large scaffold scripts — create/edit files directly.
Ask before renaming directories or making structural changes.
Keep commits small, readable, and incremental.
